name: An Unusual Friend
description:
Collect the Banana! Swap between the Banana and the Viking to solve Puzzles!

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Space - Throw Banana (or Fire)

c- Change character (you can swap to banana after you throw it)

Hint: Try to through the Banana at the Enemies!

In a world where a drunk viking strands on an island where corrupted gun wielding snowmen block the path back to the boat, that same viking needs a true friend. And he has that friend - a banana. A banana with sunglasses. But the snowmen coincindentally want the banana for themselves as there are no carrots on this island. Together they will defeat the evil snowmen and escape this island.
